mapper.select: SELECT office_id, office_major_code, office_minor_code, office_name, sort_no, is_used FROM o_office ORDER BY sort_no
mapper.insert: insert into o_office (office_id, office_major_code, office_minor_code, office_name, sort_no, is_used) values (#{officeId}, #{officeMajorCode}, #{officeMinorCode}, #{officeName}, #{sortNo}, #{isUsed})
